summary: This mod allows you to play as a Goblin.
descriptionHtml:
Goblin Race is a mod which allows you to play as a Goblin and have a companion named Kos Zgur, which is also a Goblin.

Features:

Goblin:

Light Armor: +10
Block: +5
Archery: +5
One-Handed: +5
Two-Handed: +5
Destruction: +5

Starting Health: 50 ( Yes 50 )
Starting Stamina: 50
Starting Magicka: 50

Power: Muffle, Goblin. This is a custom Power that ables you to have a 2 times stronger sneak attack than normally. Also, Goblins normally have a 3x Sneak Attack.
Health Regenerate: 2x faster than other races, because of the 50 starting health
Stamina Regenerate: Changed to 0.5 to 0.8 regenerate per second, because of the lack in speed.

Kos Zgur: Can be found in Whiterun at the big tree, levels with you and is also an Goblin.

Thanks for revieuwing my mod and I hope you like it, this is my second mod of all time and I think I\'ve done a pretty good job... :)

Greetings, Django

TAKE A LOOK AT MY GREYBEARD ROBES MOD!:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24918/
author: Django Rossa

files.name: Main File - Goblin Race
files.changelogHtml:
Changed +10 Heavy Armor skill to +10 Light Armor skill.
Changed +5 Light Armor skill to +5 Block skill.
Fixed some grammar bugs in Text Data.
Changed Stamina Regenerate for Goblins from 5.0 to 8.0

files.name: Main File - Goblin Race
files.changelogHtml: Added custom Power to the Goblin Race.
